channel.title: iDigital
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from iDigital, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Why 2025 will be the year of AI orchestration
item.description: For many, 2025 will be the year of AI agents, when pilot programs, experiments and use cases converge into something resembling ROI.

item.title: Stocks are skipping the ‘Santa Claus rally’ again this year. That doesn’t bode well for January.
item.description: Santa Claus is leaving investors in the lurch once again in 2024 as U.S. stocks have struggled during the typically bullish home stretch of the year.

item.title: Natural-gas prices see biggest jump in nearly 3 years, leading oil higher
item.description: Natural-gas prices soared on Monday, tallying their biggest percentage-point gain in nearly three years.

item.title: My mother is giving my son $100K for a down payment. Can she wait until the last minute to put the money in his account?
item.description: “She really doesn’t want to send it to them until they’re ready to make the purchase.”

item.title: Nvidia to open-source Run:ai, the software it acquired for $700M to help companies manage GPUs for AI
item.description: Nvidia has completed its acquisition of Run:ai, a software company that makes it easier for customers to orchestrate GPU clouds for AI.

item.title: My friend has a dependent son, 32, who drives without car insurance. Would his parents be criminally liable if he has an accident?
item.description: “They declare him as a dependent for tax purposes.”

item.title: Despite intense AI arms race, we’re in for a multi-model future
item.description: There will be no single model that will rule the universe, neither next year nor next decade. Instead, the future of AI will be multi-model.

item.title: 10-year Treasury yield logs sharpest drop in a month to kick off holiday-shortened week
item.description: Bond yields fell sharply ahead of New Year’s Eve, after concerns about sticky inflation had pushed benchmark yields to the highest since late May.

item.title: Why 2025 will redefine data infrastructure: 11 expert insights on sovereign clouds, exploding data, PaaS and more
item.description: Key predictions from data infrastructure industry experts and vendors to help enterprises tap the AI opportunity for growth in 2025.

item.title: Forrester on cybersecurity budgeting: 2025 will be the year of CISO fiscal accountability
item.description: With 90% of cybersecurity and risk leaders predicting they'll see budget increases in 2025, many are facing a new era of accountability.
